item.title: New spell underway
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

[quote=“fr33sc4p3”][quote author=LegendScape link=topic=81898.msg890799#msg890799 date=1171273702]

This isnt hard its just adding xtra gfx
[/quote] ah interesting view but it would make things too easy, i have added more then just gfx for ex, they each cause harm in different forms, such as the liddl red dots seen above the block of ice gives some hp from the victem to me, its basically a mixture of all the ancient spells and some added extras such as damage to others standing near you and protection to you

Its basicly copy and pasting, dont make out as if its some hard task please[/quote]

ok oh so wise and knowing, tell me, what did i do and how did i do it and tell me the effects the spells which did i fuse and what gfx was used or was it animation not gfx or maybe i mixed them if so tell me which is which if there is in fact a mix, also tell me the radius if any the outside spells have rather then the inside will the enemies touched by the far end spells be frozen, poisoned, harmed, or just left alone. Untill you can answer those questions correctly sir I do not think you have the right nor the knowledge of my skills to asume copy and pasting was what i have done.

Read full topic
